name: The Caper Chase
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Jeff Westbrook
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: When mr burns goes to Yale university after being forced to strengthen his knowledge on nuclear power, he realises how politically correct it is so ( being influenced) he decides to start his own college. Note:this is a parody on trump university featuring voice appearances of Ken Jennings , suze orman , Neil degrease Tyson , Robert McKee as themselves and Jason Alexander as bourbon verlander.
